title: The Secret Sex Life of Billionaire Bradley
description: To the outside world, billionaire Ted Bradley is the perfect gentleman. A respected businessman and devoted husband to his adorable wife, Charlotte Bradley. He owns and runs several successful businesses, including Titanium Models, a prestigious modelling agency popularly known for it's professional models and top dollar clientele. What the world does not know, is the fact that he has a secret. One that could destroy his perfect public image if it ever got out. To seventeen year old Beverly Shaw, getting accepted into Titanium Models is an opportunity of a lifetime. She looks forward to achieving her dreams of becoming a supermodel, along with having an exciting life in the Big Apple. At the top of her bucket list is landing a celebrity boyfriend as a perfect response to her high school ex-boyfriend for dumping her.
author: Andy Blunt
